# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a page scroll notification with a string.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ announcement: String)
```

## Creating a page scroll notification

- **init(_:)**: Creates a page scroll notification with an attributed string value.
- **init(_:)**: Creates a page scroll notification with an attributed string object.
